DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to document long-term response in real-life practice after injection cycles with BoNT-A in subjects suffering from idiopathic cervical dystonia (Long-term clinical and pharmaco-economic data).
DOC.criteria: Subject for whom there is an intention to treat with BoNTA. BoNT treatment na√Øve or previously treated with BoNT. If previously treated with BoNT, at least a 12week interval between the last injection (BoNTA or BoNTB) and inclusion. Subject able to comply with the protocol. Provision of written informed consent prior to collect the data. Contraindications to any BoNTA preparations. The subject has already been included in the study.
